DOC.brief_summary: This study was conducted to describe the time to first incidence of otorrhea post tympanostomy tube insertion.
DOC.brief_title: Natural History Study of Incidence of Otorrhea Following Tympanostomy Tube Insertion in Children 6 Months to 12 Years
DOC.criteria: Participants must be at least 6 months old and no more than 13 years of age at the time of enrollment scheduled for unilateral or bilateral myringotomy and tympanostomy tube insertion. Patients and/or child must read/sign informed consent and comply with requirement of the study. There are no exclusion criteria.
